item.title: Writing a Bittorrent engine in Rust
item.description: This post recounts the journey of writing cratetorrent, interesting optimizations, and some of the insights gained.

item.title: Cool Vim Settings
item.description: A collection of some useful and not-so-obvious things you can do with vim, taken from my vimrc.

item.title: Servo Internals: Loading Pages
item.description: This blog post is part of a series I’m doing on Servo. It’s a deep dive into how Servo loads a page given a URL. Please note, though, that it is still heavily work-in-progress. Some details may be missing or incorrect.

item.title: Servo Internals
item.description: I recently started contributing to Mozilla’s Servo, and I take a lot of notes while walking through the code base. I decided to furnish them with explanations and put them online–primarily for myself as future reference, but also in hopes that it may be useful for others.
